sentences.sentence: I expect to see you back here, pronto!
sentences.translation: 我希望你立即回到这里来！

sentences.sentence: You'd better get your homework done pronto!
sentences.translation: 你最好现在马上做你的功课。

sentences.sentence: Give me that report pronto! I needed it yesterday.
sentences.translation: 立刻把报告给我！我其实昨天就要了。
